summary: Test module that validates the initialization and configuration handling of the Canary integration within Home Assistant, checking behavior when credentials are missing and when a full configuration is provided, and supplying utilities for setting up and tearing down test environments with mock devices, locations, and sensor readings.
business_intent: Ensure the Canary component reliably processes configuration data and initializes correctly, preventing errors in deployment and guaranteeing proper interaction with mocked Canary entities during automated testing.
